DOC.brief_summary: Genetic polymorphism affects plasma concentration of antiretroviral therapy in HIV patients. The investigators investigate the prevalence of genetic polymorphism affecting efavirenz metabolism and the corresponding pharmacokinetics of different genotypes.
DOC.brief_title: Preference of Genetic Polymorphism and Pharmacokinetics
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible patients are invited to donate blood samples for pharmacokinetic study and genotype analysis
DOC.criteria: Southern Chinese HIV patients on efavirenz Refuse to sign consent, HIV patients not on efavirenz
